    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_100074</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Friction in biking</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion beim Radfahren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frottement en faisant du vélo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fricção em biking</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrito nel biking</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τριβή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fricción en biking</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how the friction between the rubber tyre and the rough road pushes the bike forward.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bicycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rough road</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rubber tyre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wheel</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie die Friktion zwischen 
dem Gummireifen und der rauhen Straße das Fahrrad nach vorn drückt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment le frottement 
entre le pneu en caoutchouc et la route rugueuse pousse le vélo en 
avant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como a fricção entre o
tyre de borracha e a estrada áspera empurra a bicicleta para a 
frente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come l'attrito fra il
pneumatico di gomma e la strada di massima fa avanzare la bici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς η τριβή μεταξύ του
λαστιχένιου ελαστικού αυτοκινήτου και του τραχιού δρόμου ωθεί το
ποδήλατο μπροστινό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo la fricción 
entre el neumático de goma y el camino áspero empuja la bici 
adelante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fahrrad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
